TopicTitle: What is the icon in the top right?

Articles.Content:
Looks kinda like this:

((()))

Then when I hover it says "none".

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T14:29:52Z" title="03/24/2015 02:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by buffs92**
That is the contracts completed. After you start completing contracts it will tell you the number completed, something like (((15))). Clicking on the icon gives a list of completed contracts.

It's basically for incoming messages. The only thing generating messages in the stock game is the contract system. One of the mods I use is [Science Funding](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102911-0-90-Science-Funding-career-mode-with-no-contracts%21-%2816-dec-2014%29?highlight=science+funding), which gives funds and rep (and generates messages) when science is sent/returned home. Of course, sandbox mode won't generate any messages
